Default: Remains of a monster worm. It's probably not edible, but someone else might find it useful in other ways.
A mix of squishiness and dangerous venom, usable for certain crafting recipes. Seems obvious, but don't ingest this.
A mutant's vocal sac cut from their body. It lets out a screech when squeezed.
Slime salvaged from a dangerous slug monster. Its unique biology might give insight into how it survives on Titan.
It might seem gross, but Savage Titan Slug remains can be used in crafting. Isn't science fun?
The sinew of the mutants lurking in the basement ceiling. Gross, but it might be helpful.
The tail of a recently deceased rat.
A long tail chopped off from the backside of a Titan Rat. Yuck!
A hide collected from the remains of underground monsters.
A bone collected from the remains of underground monsters.
A mutant egg discovered in the mines. It could hatch at any moment.
A mutant egg found attached to another creature. Don't let it touch your skin.
A dead Muncher isn't worth much, but the bio-matter in its belly could be valuable.
A hardened jawbone that could make a handy weapon with some work.
The heavy, armored claw of a dead Smasher. It strangely separated from the rest of the corpse without resistance.
A plate of armor ripped from a Crusher's shoulder. They really are heavily protected everywhere.
Почти человеческая голова Рептилоида. Надеюсь, она не отрастит ноги в вашей сумке.
The removed hand of a Spawner, sharp claws and all. Might be useful for crafting.
A chunk of slightly charred Blaster backbone removed at the spinal base to retain its natural qualities.
The enlarged, dangerous Slicer arm. Reminiscent of a crab's pincer if you think about it.
The solid and pointy attacking arm of a Stabber. It will require some reshaping to be of any use.
A Grabber's stretchy and slimy tongue cut out of its skull at the base.
The bloody remains of an Exploder after bursting into flames. Still slightly combustible.
Drifter remains made up mostly of dead nanobots. Try not to inhale them.
A mix of dead Floater cells and dead nanobots. Just looks like a pile of ashes.
Viscous goo from the bowels of a Spewer. It smells disgusting but may be of some use.
Sticky and acidic slime coughed up by a Belcher. Hard to collect and feels gross in your pocket.
The hand... or is it more of a claw... of the mutant that once lurked in the basement ceiling.
Кусок раковины Диггера, но немного маловат. Вам понадобится их много, чтобы изготовить что-нибудь.
The most durable part of a Burrower's exoskeleton. It could be shiny after a bit of buffing.
The battered shell of a large beetle. It's in good shape, so maybe it's still useful.
This pile of bile and exoskeletal shards from a dead Savage Titan Beetle may be usable in crafting. Go on... try it!
A mutant backbone that could be helpful for crafting.
Refined ilmenite. This should be useful for Crafting certain items.
Refined nickel. This should be useful for Crafting certain items.
Refined petalite. This should be useful for Crafting certain items.
Refined iron ore. This should be useful for Crafting certain items.
Refined copper ore. This should be useful for Crafting certain items.
A bundle of twigs collected from Earth-born trees that were brought to Titan.
A sticky substance that can only be extracted using a one-of-a-kind harvesting tool. Usable in Crafting.
Fruit carefully gathered from poisonous Titan plants.
A unique lotus flower altered by Titan's environment nanobots. It should be cultivated while in full bloom.
A bundle of ordinary leaves from Earth plants brought to Titan by the first settlement.
This special berry that grows from certain Titan plants can actually cause explosions. Could it be a substitute for gunpowder?
Cotton that has been strengthened by prolonged exposure to Titan's atmosphere.
A hardened spike detached from a cannibal plant's tentacles.
Pieces of wood that could be used to craft other items.
This simple acid is synthesized from plant material after a lengthy process.
Titanium Ore (or ilmenite) mined from the caves below. It can be Recycled into Refined Titanium.
Nickel ore mined from the caves below. It can be Recycled into Refined Nickel.
A pitch-black stone found within certain mutated creatures. It can be altered to create Special Modules.
A deep blue stone found within certain mutated creatures. It can be altered to create Nano Modules.
A bright yellow stone found within certain mutated creatures. It can be altered to create Survival Modules.
A blood-red stone found within certain mutated creatures. It can be altered to create Physical Modules.
White methane ore mined from the caves below. It can be Recycled into Refined Methane.
Lithium ore (or petalite) mined from the caves below. It can be Recycled into Refined Lithium.
Iron ore mined from the caves below. It can be Recycled into Refined Iron.
Shards of heated silica sand mined from the caves below. Usable in Crafting.
Crimson red crystal shards dropped by monsters. Can be sold for quite a good number of Credits.
A gorgeous red geode perfect for Brett's collection. Can be sold for quite a good number of Credits.
Deep violet crystal shards dropped by monsters. Can be sold for a high number of Credits.
A stunning purple geode perfect for Brett's collection. Can be sold for a high number of Credits.
Bright blue crystal shards dropped by monsters. Can be sold for a small number of Credits.
A beautiful blue geode perfect for Brett's collection. Can be sold for a small number of Credits.
Copper ore mined from the caves below. It can be Recycled into Refined Copper.
It's still hard to believe there are plants on Titan. Any usable wood is composited from various native plants.
Recycling and reusing are even more critical when stranded on this rock.
These mechanical parts from broken machines can be reworked into new items.
Scraps of cloth from old clothes and the like. Does the camp even have a tailor?
Some loose components from broken electronics. Hopefully the others know how to work with these.
A material extracted from an underground creature's tissue. It could be useful for producing other items.
A toxic solution extracted from dangerous monsters and poisonous plants. Usable in Crafting.
Marrow from mutant bones that could be used to produce other items.
Extracted by recycled plants that have adapted to Titan's environment. With TECC's tech, it could be used to make plastic.
A combustible powder extracted from fire-based monsters and plants. Usable in Crafting.
This material extracted from monster blood could be helpful in producing something else.
A corrosive composite extracted from certain monsters or acidic plants. Usable in Crafting.
